title: Singapore Sling
instructions: Put all the liquids into a cocktail shaker with some crushed ice, shake well and pour into a glass.  Garnish with the pineapple slice and cherry.
source: Southeast Asian Specialties:  A Culinary Journey, Culinaria Könemann, © 1998 Könemann Verlagsgesellschaft mbH, Bonner Strasse 126 · D-50968 Cologne.
